question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows an anatomical diagram on the monitor.)  Named for a 19th-century surgeon, McBurney's point, 2/3rds the distance between the umbilicus & the iliac crest of the pelvis, is the most tender abdominal area when this organ is inflamed & often requires surgery
